Date: Thursday, 2/2/1990
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of Gerald Perry.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Eric Yelding
Dear Sir,
Eric Yelding has an AVG of .290 at AA Pittsfield Valley Cats!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Troy Neel
Dear Sir,
Troy Neel shouldn't play at AA Pittsfield Valley Cats!
He has an AVG of .220 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Scott Leius
Dear Sir,
Scott Leius isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Pittsfield Valley Cats!
He has an AVG of .223, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Paul Quantrill
Dear Sir,
Paul Quantrill has nothing more to prove at A Daytona Cubs!
He has an ERA of 2.63 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
